item.title: Hilbert's Nullstellensatz
item.description: In this note we state and prove Hilbert’s Nullstellensatz. We will also see that it is equivalent to the [[notes/Algebraic Geometry/Weak Nullstellensatz|Weak Nullstellensatz]].

item.title: Vanishing Ideal
item.description: The [[notes/Algebraic Geometry/Algebraic Sets|zero set]] of an ideal in a polynomial ring gives us a way to get geometric information from algebraic data.

item.title: Weak Nullstellensatz
item.description: We will state and prove three different, but equivalent, versions of the Weak Nullstellensatz, one of the most fundamental theorems in algebraic geometry.

item.title: Commutative Algebra
item.description: Table of Contents Hilbert Basis Theorem

item.title: Hilbert Basis Theorem
item.description: In this note we prove that a polynomial ring over a Noetherian ring is Noetherian. The idea of the proof is to take an ideal $I$ of $R[x]$ and create an ideal in $R$ that consists of all the leading coefficients of polynomials in $I$.
